channel.title: Looking for village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Looking for village"

item.title: Re: Looking for village
item.content:encoded: You can join Tsuki if you choose. We are at about 30+ members regularly with 100+ upgrades now. We are very active and are doing zombjas(coordinated attacks) regularly. We entice kaijus(with a drop bidding system) and hold contests frequently. Of course we help each other as well, that is what being a village is all about ;)

item.title: Looking for village
item.content:encoded:
Im a season 2 sp. jonin, very active (everyday). My village isnt very active or organized. Any large villages with lots of upgrades out there that are also active and have good teamwork looking for villagers? I also would really like a village w/ great teamwork on zombja maps, frequent kaijus and contests, and willing to help each other

I can probably join in about 2weeks time when Im finished w/ current stuff.
